query:
WITH inserted AS (
                    INSERT INTO user_sessions (token_hash,user_id,master_key_salt,master_key_encr)
                    VALUES ($1,$2,$3,$4)
                    RETURNING token_hash, user_id, created_at, expires_at)
                SELECT
                    s.token_hash, s.created_at, s.expires_at
                FROM inserted AS s
                JOIN users AS u ON u.id = s.user_id
